description: Unified Zebrunner MCP server for TCM test cases, suites, coverage analysis, launchers, etc.

ZEBRUNNER_URL.description: Base URL for your Zebrunner instance (e.g., https://your-instance.zebrunner.com)

RETRY_ATTEMPTS.description: Number of retry attempts for failed API requests (default: 3)

RETRY_DELAY.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds (default: 1000)

MAX_PAGE_SIZE.description: Maximum page size for paginated API requests (default: 100, max: 1000)

DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE.description: Default page size for paginated API requests (default: 10)

ENABLE_RULES_ENGINE.description: Enable the rules engine for test case validation (default: auto-detected from mcp-zebrunner-rules.md file)

STRICT_URL_VALIDATION.description: Enable strict URL validation for security (default: true)

SKIP_URL_VALIDATION_ON_ERROR.description: Skip URL validation if it fails (less secure, more permissive) (default: false)

ENABLE_RATE_LIMITING.description: Enable rate limiting for API calls (default: true)

MAX_REQUESTS_PER_SECOND.description: Maximum API requests per second (default: 5, max: 100)

RATE_LIMITING_BURST.description: Allow burst of API requests (default: 10, max: 200)
